introText:
This App is a tool to assist healthcare professionals in assessing the diagnostic criteria of Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorder (FASD) according to international guidelines (Hoyme, 2016).

This App is developed by VisualTEAF and the Research Group on Childhood and Environment (GRIE) at Hospital Clínic-Maternitat, ICGON, FCRB, IDIBAPS, BCNatal, RICORS (RD21/0012/0017), Barcelona.

© Visual TEAF 2023
infoAgeText: In children under 3 years of age, the neurocognitive study is based on developmental delay. In addition, in children under 6 years of age and in those over 18 years of age, the behavioral study cannot be performed.
infoDomainsText: Watch the following video for more information on the affected domains:
watch_weight_video: Watch the following video for more information on how to measure weight:
watch_height_video: Watch the following video for more information on how to measure height:
measure_head_circumference: Use a non-stretchable tape measure. Firmly wrap the tape measure around the widest possible circumference of the head. The widest part of the forehead above the eyebrows, above the ears, the most prominent part of the back of the head. Watch the following video for more information on how to measure head circumference:
watch_palpebral_video: Watch the following video for more information on how to measure palpebral distance:
visit_link_diagnosis: Visit the link for more information about the diagnosis:
data_loss_confirmation: If you return to the Home page, the data entered during the diagnosis will be deleted. Are you sure you want to return to the Home page?
